articles.title: Watch: Aamir Khan and Kiran Rao Make Video Appearance Post Separation Announcement - News18
articles.description: Bollywood star Aamir Khan and his wife, filmmaker Kiran Rao, have announced their divorce in a statement issued to the press on Saturday.
articles.content:
Bollywood star Aamir Khan and his wife, filmmaker Kiran Rao, have announced their divorce in a statement issued to the press on Saturday.
